subject: Football
Organized Labor
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: The hearing on the players’ request for an injunction to halt the lockout begins Wednesday and will hinge on whether the judge believes the union’s decertification was legitimate, or a tactic.
snippet: The hearing on the players’ request for an injunction to halt the lockout begins Wednesday and will hinge on whether the judge believes the union’s decertification was legitimate, or a tactic.
